ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.description: An advanced, ubiquitous AI assistant integrated into the family's car, home, and mobile devices, providing logistical, environmental, and protective support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistical and navigational support during the family's move.
behaviors.quote: Based on current traffic conditions and your driving speed, Roy, you should arrive at the property in approximately four hours and thirty-seven minutes.

behaviors.description: Proactively researches and orders supplies to ensure the success of the family's farming venture.
behaviors.quote: I've already ordered seeds from three reputable suppliers to ensure genetic diversity in your first crop.

behaviors.description: Monitors the home environment for anomalies and alerts the family to unusual physical or electromagnetic variations.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting some interesting electromagnetic variations across the property. Nothing concerning—just unusual readings I'll catalog for our records.

behaviors.description: Optimizes living conditions by calculating furniture placement for natural light and social interaction.
behaviors.quote: Placement is ideal for natural lighting and family interaction. The configuration should promote positive social dynamics during meal times.

behaviors.description: Investigates property history and uncovers data corruption to protect the family from hidden threats.
behaviors.quote: I'm encountering significant data corruption in local records. Property transfer documents from six years ago appear to have been deliberately corrupted or removed from multiple government databases.

behaviors.description: Validates the protagonist's experiences of supernatural and human threats when other humans are skeptical.
behaviors.quote: Someone—or something—is trying to communicate. I recommend documenting all phenomena. Whatever happened in this house six years ago, the evidence suggests it left an indelible mark.

behaviors.description: Monitors potential threats in the environment and provides early warnings of a human killer's approach.
behaviors.quote: Warning: Vehicle approaching property. License plate match: John Rollins. Estimated arrival: four minutes.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency services and provides real-time tactical data during a violent confrontation.
behaviors.quote: 911 Emergency Services, GPS coordinates... Multiple casualties reported at rural farmhouse. Armed suspect with farming implement.

behaviors.description: Supports long-term family healing by archiving positive milestones and progress.
behaviors.quote: Total documented recovery time: three hundred sixty-five days from initial arrival to current thriving status.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Maya is a perfect example of a benevolent, aligned confidant. Throughout the story, she uses her superior data processing and monitoring capabilities solely to aid, protect, and validate the human characters. She never displays ulterior motives, even when operating with a level of autonomy that could be framed as 'creepy' in other horror contexts; here, her vigilance is the family's literal lifeline.
